case.state: This place looks private. Hopefully Umbrella hasn't bugged this place too.
I bet no one has ever heard of ex-cop playing strip poker after their shift.
Good thing I'm not a cop anymore, or I would be taking you all in for indecent exposure.
Strip Poker? I've played poker before but not the strip version.
This is gonna be exciting. I never played strip poker before.
Strip Poker, huh? Alright let's do this.
The STARS team used to play poker every weekend. This'll be a piece of cake.
What? Are you afraid of clowns?
Are you okay, kid?
This place is scary. It's like the forest of Arklay.
This place gives me the creeps. Stay alert.
Whoa, this mansion looks similar to the one I ended up with my team. I'm Jill.
Wow, what a mansion. I'm Jill, Jill Valentine.
I don't have good experiences with mansions, but I guess this could change it. I'm Jill Valentine. I'm an... I was an officer of RPD.
At least this room is better than the rooms at the Apple Inn.
At least this room is better than the rooms at the Apple Inn. I wonder if they have cookies like the ones of the Apple Inn?
Not the place you'd expect to play strip poker.
Do you guys think it's a good idea to play here? This alley is kinda dirty.
There better be no cameras, I don't want this ending up in the internet.
Are we going to play here? This is a shower room. I'm Jill.
I didn't expect us to play strip poker in a shower room... I'm Jill. Jill Valentine.
What a nice bar... It's better than Jack's bar.
What a stylish bar... better than Jack's bar.
Not the kind of bar that you'd see in Raccoon City.
This was a speakeasy for games?
We're playing here? If I knew we would play outdoors, I would've brought my cigarettes. I'm Jill.
Too bad I didn't bring my cigarettes. I'm Jill Valentine.
If I knew we were playing outside I would have brought some smokes.
Whoa, this library is bigger than the one that was at the station.
I wonder if they have books about herbs of Raccoon City here?
I wouldn't be surprised if they had books of the success of Umbrella.
Any book shelves reveal a secret passageway? I could usually tell but I'm not sure here.
Maybe I could use my lock-pick to get that girl out of that locker?
Poor girl, maybe I could open that locker with my lock-pick?
Looks like I stepped into a place of criminal activity.
(Since when are criminals into strip poker?)
Why am I always chased by weird creatures?
Hi there, I'm Jill, Jill Valentine. Just us? Where are the others?
Two people? Why is everyone is so shy? I'm Jill.
Two people? Where is everyone? I'm Jill.
Just guys, huh? I can deal with this.
Wow... I didn't want this kind of attention, but its okay. This will be fun.
This is like when I play poker with my team. I'm Jill.
Oh. A Jill sandwich.
Where are the guys, huh? Just girls for this... okay. It could be fun.
I thought there would be guys in this game as well. I'm Jill.
A girls night isn't so bad. I'm Jill Valentine, I'm an ex-cop.
Just one guy, huh? No problem. I'm Jill Valentine, used to be a cop.
Don't be shy. I'm Jill, I'm... I was a police officer.
I used to play poker with Barry, Chris and Rebecca, but not the strip version. I'm Jill. Jill Valentine.
I'm Jill Valentine. I was an officer of the RPD. Nice to meet you.
Time to relax from work. I'm Jill Valentine. I was a police officer.
Just give me ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.
Just ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, dealer.
Give me ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s.|.)~
Can you give me ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please?
I need one more card, dealer; how about giving me a hand, hmm?
Good thing I learned a lot of poker when I played with my team.
Do your best, ~player~. I'm not going easy with you.
Get ready, here it comes!
Nice, I got something!
I'm ready. Let's go!
Don't be surprised that a STARS member is good at this.
When I played with Chris, it was hard for me to get a hand like this.
I'm glad Chris taught me how to play.
I doubt I'll lose this time.
Why was seven afraid of nine? Cuz seven ate nine.
Alright, let's do this!
Where was this hand three rounds ago?
This hand would have been nicer three rounds ago.
You need a better hand to beat this one.
Ready to go!
Changing those two cards was a very good tactic.
This hand will save me... for now.
I'm not going to lose this round. I'm sure of that.
*sigh* I thought I wouldn't make it.
Ready to kick ass!
I'm not going to give up that easily.
Not a bad hand, not good either.
This hand isn't too bad, I guess it can still help me.
I'm glad I at least have this.
Come on!
I wish I had a better hand, but I guess this will do.
At least this can't get worse.
I need to be more careful, this hand is not so bad, but I still can lose.
I don't like this hand a bit.
I hope this is enough to handle this,
This hand will leave me out of trouble... I think.
This has to be enough to win this.
It will be hard to not lose this round.
I must remain optimistic. I didn't give up when that Tyrant cornered me!
I won't give up that easily.
I was building up for a big fight.
I've got a bad feeling about this... are there any typewriters around here?
I shouldn't be too negative. Maybe I'll win this round.
Dealer, wait! Damn! I changed the wrong card.
Damn... this can't be good.
My luck in this game is still better than my luck in that mansion.
I might be the Master of unlocking, but I'm not the master of Poker.
Damn, this is getting a little intense. At least not too intense..
Damn. I'm playing too cautiously. Should have changed that card.
Are you shitting me!?
Wesker used to tell us that half of the things are luck... the other half is fate.
Oh come on! I don't have the luxury to lose.
I can't start to lose my hopes now.
I have a bad feeling about this.
I have to stop being so bitter. Maybe I'll win this round.
I still can win... I know I can.
No... come on... I know I can make it.
Deep breaths... deep breaths and relax.
At least the forfeit isn't too bad.
I've played normal poker before, but not strip poker.
I forgot to tell you about my partner Chris. He was my partner. Someone I could count on all situations. Especially if it's related to Umbrella.

Did I tell you about Rebecca? She's a rookie that got into STARS not too long ago. She is a very good medic and is very smart with chemistry. Sometimes I play basketball with her, she's very good at it.
Did you guys know that the blue herbs from Raccoon City can be used to treat poisoning? And, if you use a bit more than you're supposed to... it can act like an aphrodisiac .
Wanna hear something interesting? You guys know that a high dose of blue herbs from Raccoon City can cause aphrodisiac effects?
Do you guys know how to use the herbs from Raccoon City? The green one is usually for wounds. Mix it with a red one and that mix can be very effective to heal you.
Any of you know how to use the herbs from Raccoon City? The green one can be used on their own as medicine. But if you mix it with a red herb it can heal most or all of your wounds.
Wanna hear something cool? Did you guys know that if the red herb from Raccoon City is processed as a pill, it can be used as a hemostat? It's kinda nice, on it's own it's useless.
You mind if I smoke here? In fact, what you think of smoker girls? Do they put you off or you like them?
What a bad way to start this game.
It might not be too bad if I'm one of the people that has more items here.
I don't care too much. I still have a lot of clothes on.
And I won't get a perfect win... damn.
I might be about to expose myself... but I've still got a shot to win.
I hope nobody from the RPD sees me, I could get fired for this.
It's too early to give up.
I can still win, just wait and see.
I know I can win. I just need to concentrate.
I think I should relax a bit. After all I'm the one that's still winning.
I'm still warming up.
Let's see... what should I strip?
I have many options... but...
I hope you don't mind if I go with small stuff.
Sorry all... I'll still go with the small stuff.
I don't have many options for things to take off, do I?
I'm kinda safe... at least.
I lost again?
I'm not embarrassed!
Damn. I'm getting cornered very easily.
You got me this time, guys.
Even if I'm losing I'll take off small stuff. Don't think I'm a sore loser or anything, I wanna keep the best for last.
What do me and a little girl have in common? We tend to fall. A lot.
Everyone else has more clothes, but that doesn't matter, I'll keep up.
I won't give up yet. I can still make it!
I never thought I would lose this much. You guys aren't cheating aren't you?
This is starting to suck. I enjoy this game but I'm losing way too much.
The last time I got a beating like this was when I fought that Tyrant.
Geez... You guys did a number on this officer.
You like my gloves? You're free to take them off my hands.
I'm going to take off my boots. This way my feet will get a bit of a rest.
The floor can't be too cold, can it?
Hopefully my feet don't get cold.
I guess these aren't covering much.
This wasn't covering much anyways.
I wasn't really wearing this anyway.
My top is next, and yes I wear a bra under it. I won't go topless... yet.
This tube top will look better on the floor, don't you think?
Dammit, I guess my skirt is next.
My bra is next... I guess you earned this.
I never thought I would fail like this.
Let me take my panties off.
Dammit, that's my last clothing item.
Shit, that's all I have left.
I'm gonna take my panties off, nobody look.
It's really hot in here. I'm almost tempted to strip my tube top as well.
How do they look guys? Is my cleavage good enough for you?
Was that a bad joke? I'm trying to improve the mood here.
Sorry, those jokes were bad and stripping my gloves wasn't good enough. I'll see if I can improve my jokes a little to improve the mood here.
I know it's something small, but if you want to make me to take my clothes off, you've got to earn it.
Glad I took my gloves off. My hands were starting to get sweaty.
Hopefully my feet don't get too cold.
My skirt looks better this way, and even better off, but let's enjoy this game for a few more rounds.
I remember when Barry found me like this in the locker room, he dashed away, he and I blushed over it.
I prefer bras without straps, feel more free and they don't show up when wearing a tube top.
I like this underwear, looks great on me, doesn't it?
Are you enjoying this? You got an officer reduced to her underwear.
I love this kind of attention, but let's keep it a secret, it will stay here.
I hope they don't find out that I'm playing a game like this. That could be harmful to my job.
Don't stare too much, I'm not going anywhere.
I'm not going to give up that easily.
I like to keep things clean, alright? Say, do you like it?
Damn, luck isn't on your side, huh?
What, You don't remember how to play?
You can't be that bad at poker, can you ~name~?
I'll be frank with you. This is something I really like about this game.
Come on, ~name~. This is what we like about this game.
You're getting harder to defeat, ~name~.
Be a nice loser and take something big off, okay?
~Name~, I'm naked so... please have some consideration.
Take off something good for me, okay? I... can compensate you for it.
I don't mind that you're helping me get off, maybe if you're good we could do some stuff outside this place.
Finally something interesting.
This might be over for me... but let me enjoy this.
Remember, girls like guys without the cold feet.
If you ever feel dumb, just remember that my partner Chris went around looking for keys to open drawers that could be opened if you forced them good enough.
Make it something big, maybe I'll be inclined to replicate your offer.
You didn't think I'd lose that easily, did you?
Nice try, ~name~.
I'm out but if you strip something nice, that'd be great.
Come on, ~name~. This can't get worse, can it?
At least I can still enjoy this after I lost.
A little compensation would be great.
You got distracted, ~name~?
You're getting a great view of my naked body, at least compensate me a bit.
I'm glad I didn't lose that round.
How are you going to manage this, ~name~?
You'll have to do better than that, ~name~.
What the hell are you doing, Brock!?
It's too early to go with the big stuff, huh?
Like missing your last bullet…
You're taking off something else too, right?
That's not all, is it?
Is that all, ~name~?!
You like to disappoint everyone, huh?
If this is a joke, it isn't funny.
This is how you repay others?
If Brad was here, he would probably go with the small stuff like you.
You still have accessories? Didn't you get rid of those already?
I can't be mad at... these... that... I mean you.
Nice boots. I think Chris has some like those too.
This game hasn't started yet. I guess taking off something small is fine.
No problem by now, just take it easy.
Playing hard to get, huh? Fine by me.
This is starting to get boring.
I'm sure you're gonna end up naked.
N-Never mind I think it's better if I... picture you naked.
Wasting police time is a serious crime... just kidding, but please take this seriously.
Let's not waste any more time.
Come on! This is unbearable.
When are we going to stop stripping small stuff? Let's get more action.
I got rid of my smaller items... But as long this means we're going to stop stripping small stuff, fine by me.
Don't tell me you're doing this to compensate for something.
Not saying you're small but sometimes a small size gun isn't that disappointing, you know?
If you feel kind, maybe you could tease me just a little bit... just for my eyes, you know?
I'm glad that didn't stopped you from showing earlier... so glad it didn't because it's... really hot.
Good thing I can play like that too.
Small stuff can count, huh?
Now you wanna repay me for the small stuff I stripped early, right?
Hey! I took off everything for you and your stripping something small now?!
That isn't all, is it?
You're gonna strip something else too, right?
Taking off the small stuff makes this game really boring.
How dare you to strip something so small when I'm naked like this? Just joking. I appreciate you taking a shot for me.
You know, I wish I had trinkets like that. Not like right now, more like in my wardrobe. Can I ask where you get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~?
Come on, let's see some action, this is not fun at all.
Don't be like that. The stripping accessories part ended a long time ago.
Can we move on?
This might be boring but it's better than running away from monsters.
Well done, ~name~. It's very honorable to back up the officer in despair.
Thank you ~name~. I owe you one.
Let's keep going, at least. Maybe I could spice up this in the next round.
Hey, I'm the ex-cop. I'm supposed to be the no-fun girl. Just joking, I'm quite the fun girl.
I'm glad I still have small stuff like you.
This is like an appetizer. Good enough for now.
Now this is getting interesting.
That's the teasing I like to see.
At least put some enthusiasm in it.
How lovely this game is...
You're not taking off just that, are you?
Can you go for something bigger?
(Tomorrow I'll probably have to do the paperwork for the new recruits.)
Finally some real action.
Can you do it better next time?
Come on, ~name~. I just got naked and masturbated for you, that isn't enough?
I would really appreciate something bigger next time, ~name~.
It would be worse if you took off an accessory or something.
Glad you took it off. I can't wait for you to go for the bigger ones
Oh my god!
It's not too early to start with those items.
I need to train more... since the incident in the mansion. I need to be ready if something happens.
Your ~clothing~? Alright. Seems fair.
Just your ~clothing~? This is getting boring.
Just your ~clothing~? You know I'm masturbating here, right?
Is that the best you can do?
That's it, ~name~.
Oh no, somebody call the fashion police.
Is that the best you can do?
~Name~, I'm masturbating here. I expect something better than that.
I'm already naked, so I guess I have the right to expect something a little better.
No backup for me this time, huh? I still can win.
Not bad, I would love to see ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ in the floor of my apartment. It would look better there.
Very well, ~name~. Let's keep going.
Now you've got my attention.
Even if I lost. I wanna see this.
Thanks, ~name~...
Nice, this is what I wanted.
That's the teasing I love to see.
This is like being in the locker room.
You got my respect, ~name~.
If you wanted to impress me, you did well.
Are you trying to impress me? Because you did well.
You look so hot without your ~clothing~.
Could you say some dirty stuff? For me?
I guess you can look all you want... you earned it after all.
Ah... Sorry I'm getting a bit frisky.
Beautifully done, ~name~. Let's see who's next.
Trying to bribe a police officer? Hehehe. Just kidding.
Nice. Good luck, ~name~.
I appreciate a man without cold feet. Shows he has no fear to show his true self.
Are you sure you wanna strip that?
Hey, no need to go the extra mile.
Too bad you didn't take that off earlier.
You don't mind if I look at you, do you?
Very nice, ~name~.
Nice choice, ~name~.
Now we're making some progress.
Don't you think it's a bit too soon to take off your ~clothing~?
I thought you were joking about taking something like that off.
You're surpassing my expectations, ~name~.
This feels so good.
Okay, let's enjoy the rest of the game.
You're gonna be naked just like me. It's just a matter of time.
Nobody is gonna come to help me, I have to do this by myself.
I still have a chance. I just need to make an effort.
You don't mind if an officer inspects you, right?
OK, time to get inspected by the officer.
You don't have anything to hide from us, do you?
Don't hide from the officer, ~name~.
I’m sorry, your shirt has to go. However, you can stay as long as you please.
If I could show my chest, you can too, come on ~name~.
Time to show us what you're made of, ~name~.
I can't wait for this!
Let's see what you're hiding there, ~name~.
Men don't have a problem exposing their chests. Go on.
I gotta say chubby guys are cute. Maybe you and I could go to eat at a diner or somewhere, would you like that ~name~?
Is it true that chubby guys cuddle better? Can I find out with you?
Wow, ~name~. You got a nice body to work for the R.P.D.
Wow... I think you're more muscular than Chris.
Nice body you have, ~name~. You could have joined S.T.A.R.S. with no problems.
I bet Barry without his shirt would look like you.
Hmm. You look a bit suspicious. Can I inspect you in a private room?
I need to feel those abs, consider it an investigation.
Has someone told you that you are male stripper material?
Not bad, ~name~. I like to keep up too.
Nice, ~name~. You like to exercise, huh?
Too bad I can't arrest guys for being hot.
You look a little thin, ~name~. Are you hungry? Maybe we could go to eat somewhere after the game? Just the two of us.
If you're hungry I could take you out to eat something, or maybe some home made food? What you think?
Wow, how do you got that scar?
That looks painful to get. How'd you got that scar?
That's a nice tattoo. Could you tell me what inspired you to get it?
You have a really nice body, ~name~.
I was feeling OFF the whole day. But then, you showed up and turned me ON!
This is just pure pleasure.
I love this game.
You look so hot, ~name~.
Well done, ~name~. This is the stuff we were waiting for.
You look great, ~name~.
So hot, you look a bit tense, maybe you want a chest massage after the game?
I teased you a bit, come on, ~name~.
If I can, you can too, let's see it, ~name~.
Don't be so shy about it. It can't be that small.
This is what I wanted too see.
Let's see what you're going to show us
It's that a gun?
Is that a high-caliber gun? Or are you just happy to see me?
Hurry up a bit. It's been a long wait, ~name~.
Too bad you didn't show it earlier. But now is the time to show it.
Let's see it, ~name~. Don't be too shy about it.
Too bad you didn't show it earlier. But now is the time to show it.
Shaving your dick makes it look kinda cute.
It can't be that... Oh.
Oh... Um... looks... healthy.
Haha, that's your size? Oh... sorry.
A ridiculous size... but I guess your skill is what matters.
Some girls like it small, don't worry too much about it.
Sometimes the smaller guns are the best... just saying.
Anything will help.
Don't feel bad,~name~. Size doesn't always matter.
Well... at least it's the naked truth.
Maybe my expectations were too high.
That's one of the reasons I came here to play.
I suppose a boner could be confused with a gun. Chris did when he was checking a drunk guy.
Wanna do something after the game?
A nice example of manhood.
This is just what I needed.
Hmmm. I bet it would fit perfectly.
That's what I wanted to see.
Being both naked... this can mean only one thing, right?
I wonder if Chris is a similar size to you.
Did I turn you on?
Big and clean, huh? Like Barry's gun... I mean his Colt Anaconda.
..... Oh, sorry. Got distracted.
Oh my... What kind of monster is that one?
My God...
That is really helping....
Wow... You got turned on by this, didn't you?
Oh, it's so big.
Oh my... you were hiding a high-caliber gun all this time?
Perfect size... but I guess the skill using it is what matters.
I guess that is one good reason to keep you in the gene pool.
Oh my...
Too bad you didn't show it earlier.
You know... I don't have to return to the precinct until tomorrow. Wanna go for a drink or something, ~name~?
Don't you think it's a bit early to take your dress off?
Don't be ashamed, ~name~.
I know this can be embarrassing, but it's the rules.
It's not like I'm into girls but...
I'm naked and I'm fine with it. Don't be shy, ~name~.
I can do it... you can too, come on.
You can do this, come on, ~name~.
Take a deep breath ~name~. You'll be fine.
No need to feel ashamed... after all, everyone saw me masturbating.
You have a similar size to Rebecca...
Looking at it from the bright side. Having small breasts could be an advantage sometimes.
I was about that size when I was a teen.
I guess they might grow up with time.
Sometimes it's better to have small breasts... just saying.
Maybe going to the gym can help with those mosquito bites or... maybe your ass. There is guys for any siez, though.
Aw, you have cute breasts, ~name~.
How cute. I guess you can still feel something if you squeeze them.
Ha... at least mine are bigger.
Having small breasts is nothing to be ashamed of.
Some guys like small breasts, don't worry too much about it.
You're really gonna go the extra mile with this, huh?
Don't be embarrassed ~name~. They look good.
I think we have a similar size you and me... wanna compare them a bit closer?
Hmmm... ah...
Do you mind if I have a closer look?
Don't feel ashamed, ~name~. After all, I'm naked next to you.
It's too late for me... but I guess you can still win.
I guess we have a similar size, ~name~.
Don't worry, if you feel vulnerable I'll be right here in case of anything.
I guess it's a decent size.
Well, size doesn't matter in the end, does it, ~name~?
Oh my god! What happened?!
What a pair of bombs!
You pack some big assets, huh?
I wish I had a similar size, but it would be hard to deal with my back hurting.
Oh my gosh, look at them so big and nice.
Geez... doesn't your back hurt?
Damn, I wouldn't want to imagine having that size and having to deal with my back hurting.
I guess mine aren't that big after all.
Glad I don't have a chest that big. I would jiggle too much when I run away from monsters.
Size isn't all. I know a lot of guys that agree with that.
My God... those are very big but... you know how to use them on your partner?
I kinda feel bad for you... I still have a lot of items to strip.
I can't wait to see this. Do you shave?
I know it can be embarrassing, but you have to do it.
No time to get embarrassed, ~name~. Be strong and just show yourself.
Being naked is not so bad. Let's see.
Don't be embarrassed, ~name~. Even if you don't shave there is nothing to worry about.
I wonder if you shave? Or do you let the grass grow?
Why haven't you shaved? I know it can be time consuming, but being hygienic is necessary.
Nice, I like it clean too.
Why do you trim your pubic hair? Is it not better to shave it all?
I'll rather shave it all, it's not a garden, you know?
You only got one more chance, ~name~. Make it count.
It's.. too late for me. But you can still win.
Now this game is more balanced.
Don't give up yet. You still can win if you play your cards right.
At least you've got one more chance, ~name~... just play your cards right.
Rebecca Lee, a.k.a. two hands. You got quite the rap sheet. How small is the world.
Rebecca Lee or Revy, right? I heard about you. You got quite the rap sheet.
Nice armor, for a pirate. And a laser ring, right? Let me guess, Umbrella made those for you, didn't they?
I have a feeling your armor and laser ring are too advanced, did umbrella make them?
Jason Voorhees? You have the appearance of a suspect in an unsolved case, not saying you were them.
Miss Voorhees, right? You kind of remind me of a suspect in an unsolved case, not saying you are a suspect though.
Wait a sec... you're that girl.
Wait... I recognize that blonde hair... you're her.
It's nice to see another officer here.
You're also involved in the case of Umbrella?
You're a scientist, ~name~? Are you involved with Umbrella by any chance?
Good Lord... For a second I thought you were a tyrant.
(~Name~ is very tall. I guess Umbrella is looking for tall people to use their DNA to create new Bio-weapons.)
Good to see a fellow soldier here.
(~Name~ looks like the suspect of that file report.) Can I ask you a few questions?
(~Name~ is probably involved with one of those pending cases.)
I'm an ex-cop... well, I was so don't try anything, okay?
I'll only ask you to behave yourself. I don't wanna spend my free time putting you under arrest.
What did the zombie said to the vampire? You suck. No? Nothing? Hmmm.
Too bad, ~name~. You were a good cop, a real good cop.
Too bad,~name~, it's your turn now.
You're finished, ~name~.
It was nothing personal, ~name~.
~Name~ is going to give me some company, huh?
At least I won't be alone at this. Come on ~name~, let's enjoy ourselves.
I didn't expect to still be in the game when a guy had to masturbate.
Thanks for taking the shot, ~name~. You're a hero.
I thought I was done that last round.
At least this isn't awkward like that time I found my partner in the military touching himself.
This is getting me... kinda aroused.
I respect a guy who is brave enough to do this in front of other people.
You already watched me ~name~. Now it's your turn.
Too bad you didn't lose earlier, We could have done this together.
I could... do it again. That way you won't feel alone again, ~name~.
Oh my... you're actually gonna do this, huh?
Alright, I don't expect much, but do a little number for me.
I don't mind doing it in front of another guy... but it feels kinda weird.
Look at the bright side. You can look at me if you want.
Now, let's see how you handle yourself.
Haha... a well deserved treat.
Do it like you do it when you're alone.
Go ahead, you can look at me if you want.
Look all you want... enjoy yourself.
This is public indecency. But I'll turn a blind eye.
It's interesting how different a guy and a girl masturbate.
Is this relaxing for you? You seem like you got quite the experience doing this on your own..
At least we can enjoy ourselves, ~name~.
We can make all the mess we want, r-right?
You are really loving this, aren't you?
The sounds you make are really lewd. It would make you feel better if I moved my hand like I was jerking you off?
Don't be so shy, ~name~. Just enjoy yourself.
That's the spirit, ~name~!
Act like we're not here, ~name~.
Play with your balls too... Men say that they like it.... Or so I've heard.
